lessonTitle: Class I (Transitive) Verbs and Series I Conjugation Mastery

exercises.title: Class I (Transitive) Verbs
exercises.instructions: Choose the correct answer about Class I transitive verbs and Series I conjugation.

questions.question: What characterizes Class I verbs in Georgian?

options.text: They are transitive verbs that take direct objects
They are only used in past tense

questions.explanation: Class I verbs are transitive verbs that take direct objects - someone does something TO something or someone.

questions.question: What is the complete Series I verb structure?
questions.explanation: The complete Series I structure is: Subject Marker + Preverb + Version + Root + Suffix

questions.question: ვდაიწერ [vdaints'er] has which components?

options.text: ვ- 'I' + და- preverb + ი- subjective version + წერ 'write'

questions.explanation: ვდაიწერ [vdaints'er] contains: ვ- subject marker + და- preverb + ი- subjective version + წერ root.

questions.question: Which of these is a Class I (transitive) verb?
questions.explanation: ხედვა [khedva] 'to see' is Class I transitive because you see something/someone. მუშაობა [mushaoba] 'to work' is Class II intransitive.

questions.question: What does ვდაუწერ [vdauts'er] mean?

options.text: I am writing for someone (perfective + objective)

questions.explanation: ვდაუწერ [vdauts'er] contains: ვ- 'I' + და- preverb (perfective) + უ- objective version + წერ 'write' = 'I will write for someone.'

exercises.title: Match Conjugations to Meanings
exercises.instructions: Match the Georgian verb forms with their correct English translations.

rightItems.text: I will look for myself (perfective + subjective)

questions.explanation: Remember the structure: base form, then add preverbs and versions to modify meaning.

exercises.title: Complete the Conjugation
exercises.instructions: Fill in the correct verb forms based on the structure provided.

questions.question: Complete: ის _____ წიგნს [is _____ ts'igns] He writes the book (3rd person singular, base form)
questions.explanation: ის წერს [is ts'ers] is third person singular of წერა [ts'era] 'to write' in base form.

questions.question: Complete: ჩვენ _____ წიგნს [ch'ven _____ ts'igns] We will write the book (1st person plural with და- preverb)
questions.explanation: ვდავწერთ [vdavts'ert] is first person plural with და- [da-] preverb for perfective aspect.

exercises.title: Identify Verb Components
exercises.instructions: Break down the verb form and identify its components.

questions.question: მივუხედავ [mivukh'edav] contains which components?

options.text: მე 'I' + მი- 'toward' + უ- objective version + ხედავ 'look'

questions.explanation: მივუხედავ [mivukh'edav] breaks down as: მე [me] implied 'I' + მი- [mi-] preverb 'toward' + უ- [u-] objective version + ხედავ [khedav] root 'look'.

questions.question: დაიწერს [daints'ers] is which person?
questions.explanation: დაიწერს [daints'ers] ends in -ს [-s], which marks third person singular. It also has და- [da-] preverb and ი- [i-] subjective version.
